:
   The city of Richmond "built the second richest team in the NFL a $14
   million stadium."

"We built the second richest team in the NFL a $14 million stadium,"
   Morrissey said during an Oct. 17 mayoral candidates debate sponsored by
   ChamberRVA.

It was $10
   million, paid for by the city and built by Richmond’s Economic Development
   Agency, said Tammy Hawley, a spokeswoman for Mayor Jones.

Morrissey’s gist - that Richmond spent a lot of money building a training
   facility for one of the richest teams in the NFL - is solid.

:
   The city of Richmond "built the second richest team in the NFL a $14
   million stadium."
